title: Anger: GAMITIN NIYO DP BLAST NAMIN ARGGHHHHH🔥🚨
description:
💛💜 𝑰𝑺𝑰𝑻𝑬 𝑮𝒆𝒏𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒍 𝑨𝒔𝒔𝒆𝒎𝒃𝒍𝒚 𝑫𝑷 𝑩𝑳𝑨𝑺𝑻 💙💚
> “𝗝𝗼𝘆 𝘄𝗮𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝘄𝗲 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗻𝗼𝘄.” ✨
Hi, I’m **(Name)** from *BSIT (Year and Section)* — a proud **𝗜𝗦𝗜𝗧𝗘 student** celebrating **20 colorful years** of excellence and growth! 💻🌈
As we continue our journey *From Joy to Pride*, I’m showing up with my colors and the **𝗜𝗦𝗜𝗧𝗘 spirit that never fades.** 🔥
Join me and the rest of the fam in this year’s DP Blast for the **20th General Assembly!** 💫

👉 [Twibbon Link](https://twibbo.nz/isitegadpblast)

#ISITE20thGA #FromJoyToPride #ISITEDPBlast #PUPSMB

title: 💛💜𝐅𝐑𝐎𝐌 𝐉𝐎𝐘 𝐓𝐎 𝐏𝐑𝐈𝐃𝐄!💙💚
